*div1 type="summary"* *p*Oliver Jones to James F. Perry, Santa Rosa, June 10, 1834. Reporting news from Austin. Robertson's colony.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Santarosa */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-10-1834">June 10th 1834*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*believing yourself and family anxious to hear something direct from *person_mentioned*Col Austin*/person_mentioned*, I take the liberty of forwarding you such information as I have obtained.*/p*
*p*I this day recd, a letter from *person_mentioned*Farther Muldoon*/person_mentioned* dated *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="05-14-1834">May 14th*/date_mentioned*, respecting *person_mentioned*Austin*/person_mentioned*, he writes as follows,*/p*--
*p*You have no doubt have known of *person_mentioned*Austin*/person_mentioned*'s imprisonment in one of the *location_mentioned*dungeons of the Inquisition*/location_mentioned* since the *date_mentioned n="02-xx-1834">beginning of february */date_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-xx-1834">until last week*/date_mentioned*, when he was put in communication, although I have been to see him several times during the extreme rigor of his *location_mentioned*prison*/location_mentioned*, but to obtain this boon, to make use of Priestcraft was of absolute necessity, the *person_mentioned*Vice President*/person_mentioned* would have suffered him to rot there without once offering him the remotest hope of his enlargement He will soon enjoy the plentitude of liberty.*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*farther */person_mentioned*says he has been living with the *person_mentioned*president */person_mentioned*since the *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1834">commencement of the present year*/date_mentioned*, that he left his *location_mentioned*country residence */location_mentioned*on the *date_mentioned n="04-17-1834">17th of apl*/date_mentioned* owing to some new disturbances making their appearences in *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*and arived at the *location_mentioned*capital */location_mentioned*on the *date_mentioned n="04-23-1834">23rd*/date_mentioned* and again took charge of the reins of govt, he is of opinion all things will become tranquil in a short time,—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Sterling Robison agent of the Nashville Company*/person_mentioned*, has obtained the *location_mentioned*coloney */location_mentioned*granted to *person_mentioned*Austin and Williams*/person_mentioned* in *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1832">1832*/date_mentioned*, I believe it cost a bribe of about thirteen hundred dollars.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Oliver Jones*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*This letter was in closed to you in a letter Directed to *person_mentioned*Williamson*/person_mentioned* I now send you the letter as there is something respecting *person_mentioned*Uncle*/person_mentioned*, I wrote you *date_mentioned n="06-25-1834">yesterday*/date_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Roberson */person_mentioned*has got the *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*but he has got it by proveing lies by some *person_mentioned*interested individuals*/person_mentioned*, but every thing that has been done by*person_mentioned* Austin and Williams*/person_mentioned* is respected and is to stand good etc I think there will be some difficulty about it yet as they will try to prove that *person_mentioned*Roberson */person_mentioned*had not the *person_mentioned*Hundred familys*/person_mentioned* which he has stated to the *person_mentioned*Government */person_mentioned*through the *person_mentioned*Ayuntameanto */person_mentioned*that he had when the law of*date_mentioned n="04-06-1840"> 6 April*/date_mentioned* was passed etc which prevented him from fullfilling his contract etc*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*M. A. B[ryan]*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Austin */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="05-26-1834">June 26 1834*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed] *person_mentioned*Mr. James F. Perry*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Peach Point*/location_mentioned* politeness *person_mentioned*Doct Shaw*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
